title: RomanizeMe
description:
RomanizeMe instantly adds pronunciation guides to non-Latin scripts (Chinese, Japanese, Korean, etc.) on any website. Connect with the world more easily! Learn pronunciation directly in your browser. Customizable, private, actively developed.

Now, this extension is updated to v2.2.0, supporting 12 languages/scripts for romanization: Chinese, East Asian, Cyrillic, Southeast Asian... More languages stay tuned.
